node.title: 2. How to Pursue Revival
node.description:
Thousands of prayers have been going up for revival, but our prayers don’t seem to be getting though. Why not? Could it be we are failing to follow the formula given for revival: confession, humiliation, repentance and earnest prayer? What does the Bible and SOP say about pursuing revival?
